page.title: 11GIRL GUIDES
page.content:
I go to Guides every Wednesday at the gym of St. Benedict's School. Lots of other girls go there. We have lots of fun playing games, going on treasure trails, going map reading. Our uniform is a special guide hat (dark blue), a red triangular tie, a blue shirt, a dark blue skirt, white socks and plimsolls. We have a special belt with a blue pocket on it. We have to have our full pockets every week which is a pencil or pen, a rubber, a note pad for writing down dates of special days, a ten pence piece for an emergency telephone call, a handkerchief in case someone hurts themselves, a plaster in case someone cuts themselves, a safety pin for fastening bandages, and a rubber band.
If you want to join guides you have to be enrolled and say a promise which is
